summary: Fed up with their strict parents, Tommy and Annika run away from home, with their friend Pippi Longstocking to look after them in their long trek.
cast: Inger Nilsson|Maria Persson|Pär Sundberg|Hans Alfredson|Benno Sterzenbach|Öllegård Wellton|Walter Richter|Fredrik Ohlsson|Kurt Zips|Bunting
title: Pippi lo pasa pipa
